#!/usr/bin/perl -w
use POSIX qw(strftime);

$conf{'geobasedir'} =  "/data/BigMac/data/GEO/GPL" ;
$confdb{'description'} = -1;
$confdb{'sequence'}= -1;
$confdb{'chromosome'}= -1;
$confdb{'chrstart'}= -1;
$confdb{'chrstop'}= -1;
$confdb{'suppliername'}= -1;
$confdb{'supplierspotid'}= 0;
$confdb{'colnr'}= -1;
$confdb{'rownr'}= -1;
$confdb{'control_type'}= -1;
